Package org.red5.net.websocket

Class WebSocketScopeManager

java.lang.Object
org.red5.net.websocket.WebSocketScopeManager
public class WebSocketScopeManager extends Object
Manages websocket scopes and listeners.
Author:
Toda Takahiko, Paul Gregoire
